They're just jealous of my success, my ability to connect with the common folk and provide them with the relief they so desperately seek. They're stuck in their ivory towers, spewing out their fancy jargon and complicated theories, but they don't know the first thing about the human body and its many mysteries.

I've helped countless people, good people, who were suffering and in pain, and I've given them their lives back. What have these scientists done, hmm? They've just sat in their labs, mixing their beakers and test tubes, and come up with nothing but a bunch of fancy words and meaningless statistics.

And another thing, these "studies" they're always talking about? They're just a bunch of numbers and graphs, but they don't take into account the human factor. They don't account for the power of hope, of faith, of the human spirit. My remedies aren't just about chemicals and compounds, they're about giving people a reason to believe in themselves, to believe that they can get better.

But I'm telling you, my remedies are the real deal. I've seen people who were at death's door, and I've brought them back to full health. I've got testimonials, plenty of them, from satisfied customers who'll tell you the same thing.

So, no, I won't be swayed by the so-called "scientific consensus". I know what I've seen, and I know what works. And if you're willing to give my remedies a try, I guarantee you'll be amazed at the results. But if you want to keep listening to those stuffy old scientists and their "research", be my guest. Just don't come crying to me when you're still suffering and in pain. I'll be here, helping people, one remedy at a time.
